tasks.title: Fix execution error when clicking execute button
tasks.description: Getting 'Error: undefined' when clicking execute for task EXEC-006. Need to investigate and fix the execution flow.
tasks.notes: Fixed by creating missing Agent-SDD script files (sdd-execute-task.sh, sdd-fix.sh, sdd-tweak.sh, sdd-check-task.sh, sdd-queue-fix.sh, sdd-queue-tweak.sh) that the Tauri backend was looking for. Updated all scripts to follow UX/UI standards with proper error handling, emojis, usage documentation, and consistent patterns.
